title: Elegant Mayura (Peacock) Kasulaperu Inspired Necklace
materials: Emeralds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This necklace features a contemporary take on the classic Kasulaperu. The intricate design showcases a majestic Mayura (peacock) pendant, embellished with dazzling cubic zirconia stones. Traditional red ruby and green emerald accents are carefully placed for a pop of color. The pendant showcases detailed filigree work and suspended gold bead drops known as 'gundlu' . The chain itself boasts a delicate woven design interspersed with cubic zirconia flowers.
occasions: or as a statement piece for formal events. Also perfect for a modern bride seeking traditional elegance with a contemporary twist.
description: A fusion of tradition and contemporary design, this necklace offers timeless appeal. The Mayura (peacock) symbolizes beauty, love, and prosperity. Meticulously crafted with attention to detail, it is sure to be a cherished heirloom. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting radiant shine. Versatile enough to complement both traditional and modern attire.
